Moskoff]] | name = Uncle Dan | relationships = Lisa (wife) }} '''Uncle Dan''' is the uncle of [[Ross Geller]] and [[Monica Geller]] portrayed by [[John C. Moskoff]]. He and his wife are at Jack and Judy's anniversary party and they see Ross and Rachel and congratulate them on their baby and their "wedding".
